task.title: How to sum up numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the sum up feature of calculator application.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully add numbers, you must know what is addition.
taskbody.result: The result from summing up is displayed.
taskbody.example:
You want to add 2 with 3. The equation will look like 3+2=5. You enter 3. Press plus button. Enter 2. Press equals button.
The result 5 appears on the screen.
